statements: SELECT * FROM customer_geo_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_geo_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_geo_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_geo_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, ST_AsText(customer_location) AS location FROM customer_geo_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_geo_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_geo_data WHERE customer_location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_geo_data WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(customer_location, ST_GeogPoint(-74.0060, 40.7128)) <= 10000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_geo_data WHERE ST_DWithin(customer_location, ST_GeogFromText('POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)'), 5000) ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_geo_data WHERE ST_Intersects(customer_location, ST_GeogFromText('POLYGON((-74.0060 40.7128, -73.9712 40.7856, -73.9207 40.7420, -73.9555 40.6692, -74.0060 40.7128))')) ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM stores ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, store_name FROM customers CROSS JOIN stores WHERE customers.customer_id = stores.store_id;
SELECT customer_name, ST_X(location::geometry) AS longitude, ST_Y(location::geometry) AS latitude FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, store_name FROM customers INNER JOIN stores ON customers.customer_id = stores.store_id;
SELECT * FROM offers;
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, name, rating FROM stores ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef'
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT id, name, location, rating FROM stores ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, stores.name AS store_name, stores.rating AS store_rating FROM customers JOIN stores ON customers.location = stores.location
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT city, state FROM locations;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT offer_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM offers WHERE discount > 0.2;
SELECT store_name, location_id, recommendation_score FROM store_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT offer_name, discount FROM offers WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT store_name, location_id, recommendation_score FROM store_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, city, state FROM customers c JOIN locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT offer_id, name, description, validity_period FROM Offers ORDER BY validity_period DESC;
SELECT store_id, name, rating FROM Stores WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, interest FROM Customer_Interests WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, location, rating FROM Stores ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interest FROM Customer_Interests WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT name, description, validity_period FROM Offers WHERE location_constraint <@ 'POINT(-73.9857 40.7484)' ORDER BY validity_period DESC;
